title: User Signup with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up using valid credentials through Supabase authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page from the Welcome Page.
Enter a valid email, username, and password.
Submit the signup form.
Check that the user is registered, logged in automatically, and redirected to the main dashboard.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that an existing user can successfully log in using correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid registered email and password.
Submit the login form.
Confirm user authentication succeeds and user is redirected to the main interface.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect username or password and proper error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid or unregistered email and/or wrong password.
Submit the login form.
Check that login is denied and a clear error message is shown to the user.

title: Set and Persist Dietary and Cuisine Preferences
description: Verify that users can set and save dietary restrictions and cuisine preferences, and preferences are persisted for subsequent sessions.

steps.description: After login, navigate to Preferences Settings.
Select dietary restrictions and ingredient exclusions.
Choose preferred cuisine types.
Save preferences.
Verify preferences are saved and correctly reflected on page reload or new login session.

title: AI-Powered Recipe Generation with Valid Input
description: Verify that the AI recipe generation returns relevant and personalized recipe results based on user input of ingredients and preferences.

steps.description: Navigate to the Create Meal component.
Input a list of available ingredients.
Submit the request to generate recipes.
Ensure a list of AI-generated recipes is returned that respects user dietary preferences.

title: AI Recipe Generation with No Ingredients Input
description: Verify behavior when no ingredients are entered: appropriate error or default suggestion is provided.

steps.description: Go to Create Meal component.
Leave the ingredients input empty and submit request.
Confirm that system either prompts for input or returns default recipes without crashing.

title: Search Recipes by Ingredients
description: Verify users can search and filter recipes by one or multiple ingredients and receive accurate results.

steps.description: Navigate to the Results List component.
Enter ingredient keywords in the search/filter box.
Execute search.
Verify that displayed recipes include the ingredients searched for and irrelevant results are excluded.

title: Recipe Detail View Displays Complete Information
description: Verify that selecting a recipe displays detailed view with ingredients, instructions, cooking times, and nutritional info.

steps.description: Select any recipe from the Results List component.
Confirm recipe detail page shows all required data fields correctly.

title: Favorites Management - Save and Retrieve
description: Verify that users can save recipes to their Favorites and that favorites are accurately stored and retrieved.

steps.description: While viewing a recipe, click the 'Add to Favorites' button.
Navigate to the Favorites Page.
Check that the saved recipe appears in the favorites list.
Refresh the page or log out and back in.
Confirm the favorites list persists and shows saved recipes across sessions.

title: Internationalization - Language Switch
description: Verify that application text dynamically switches according to language selection and translations render correctly.

steps.description: Open Settings and change the language to a non-default option.
Confirm all UI text, including buttons, labels, and navigation, update correctly.
Navigate throughout various pages.
Verify translations persist across navigation and components.

title: Theme Switching - Light to Dark Mode
description: Verify the application can switch between light and dark themes dynamically with no UI glitches or readability issues.

steps.description: Navigate to Settings.
Toggle the theme switch to dark mode.
Confirm the entire UI updates to dark mode without layout or content overlap issues.
Toggle back to light mode.
Verify the UI reverts correctly to light mode with all elements visible and styled.

title: Backend API - Recipe Generation Endpoint Success
description: Verify that the AI Routes API for recipe generation responds correctly with valid data and HTTP 200 status.

steps.description: Send a valid POST request with ingredients and preferences to the AI Routes '/generate' endpoint.
Check the HTTP response code is 200 OK.
Ensure response contains a list of generated recipes with all required fields.

title: Backend API - Favorites Management Endpoint Error Handling
description: Verify that the Favorites Routes API gracefully handles invalid requests such as saving a malformed recipe or unauthorized access.

steps.description: Send a POST request to Favorites API with invalid or incomplete recipe data.
Verify response contains an appropriate error message and HTTP status 400 or 401 as per scenario.

title: In-Memory Cache Service TTL Expiry
description: Verify that cached data expires correctly after the specified Time-To-Live, ensuring fresh data is fetched afterward.

steps.description: Request a frequently queried recipe data to cache it.
Wait for the configured TTL duration plus a buffer.
Request the same recipe data again.
Confirm that new data is fetched and cache is refreshed after TTL expiry.

title: UI Responsiveness on Mobile and Desktop
description: Verify that all UI components adapt correctly and remain usable on both desktop and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the application in different viewport sizes simulating desktop and various mobile devices.
Ensure layouts, buttons, texts, and navigation adapt and remain fully functional without overflow or clipping.

title: Performance Benchmark Under Typical User Load
description: Verify that the application UI and backend APIs meet responsiveness standards under expected concurrent user loads.

steps.description: Simulate typical user interactions including login, preferences update, recipe generation, and favorites management with concurrent users.
Confirm UI remains responsive within acceptable time limits and backend APIs respond within performance benchmarks.
